events.text: The Spirit is poured out at Pentecost
Peter preaches and many are baptized
Believers share possessions and gather regularly
Peter and John heal the man at the temple gate
The apostles are arrested and then released
Ananias and Sapphira lie and die in judgment
Seven servants are chosen to help with daily distribution
Stephen is stoned and calls on the Lord
Persecution scatters the church from Jerusalem
